Scattershot/Breakdown/Dark One:




Scattershot ducked, a blast scraping his left shoulder.  Raising his optic 
sensors to focus on Stalker, he fired off three green blasts at Stalker.

---

Dark One fired off 15 explosive rounds at Stalker from his sub-machine gun.

---

Breakdown targeted once more, blasts digging into his armor, beginning to get 
to unwanted places.  Breakdown, still in his artillery mode, fired off 
another explosive shell at Stalker.
